detail_desc: Sleeveless fitted top in a sturdy rib knit with a slight sheen and a V-neck front and back.
Hooded jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Hooded jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Hard plastic smartphone case with a selfie light in two places. Built-in battery. USB 2.0 charging cable included. Fits iPhone 6/7. The cable is only for charging and synchronisation via a computer.

Paper straw earrings decorated with beads and sparkly stones. Length approx. 6.5 cm
Knee-length dress in a crêpe weave with a V-neck and short, puff sleeves with narrow cuffs and a covered button. Concealed zip at the back, seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.
5-pocket shorts in washed stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
5-pocket shorts in washed stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Jacket in a patterned weave with a stand-up collar, detachable hood and zip down the front. Elastication around the hood, cuffs and hem. Partly lined in fleece.
Short shorts in a soft, patterned weave with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.
Short shorts in a soft, patterned weave with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.
Short shorts in a soft, patterned weave with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.
Sports bra in fast-drying, jacquard-patterned, functional fabric with a wide, elasticated hem. Seamless. Light support.

Jacket in fast-drying functional fabric with a drawstring hood, zip down the front and pockets in the side seams. Dropped shoulders and long sleeves with gathered seams and ribbed cuffs. Soft brushed inside.

Jacket in fast-drying functional fabric with a drawstring hood, zip down the front and pockets in the side seams. Dropped shoulders and long sleeves with gathered seams and ribbed cuffs. Soft brushed inside.
Short, wide, sports top in printed, fast-drying mesh layered over a vest top with a racer back.

Wedge-heel ankle boots in imitation suede with a zip in one side. Satin linings, imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Heel 8 cm.
Hair set with two hair clips in grosgrain-covered metal and two hair elastics. All with padded glittery appliqués. Length of hair clips 4 cm.
Hat in thermal fleece with a contrasting colour trim at the hem.
Hat in thermal fleece with a contrasting colour trim at the hem.
Ankle boots in imitation suede with covered heels and a soft shaft with a zip on the inside. Fabric linings, imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Heel 5.5 cm.

Blouse in a striped weave with a V-neck, gathers around the neckline and concealed hook-and-eye fasteners at the top. Long raglan sleeves with smocking at the cuffs.

Boots in imitation leather with an ankle-height shaft with lacing at the front and a zip in the side. Loop at the back and a decorative welt seam around the soles. Fleece linings and insoles and chunky rubber soles. Heel approx. 2.5 cm.

Boots in imitation leather with an ankle-height shaft with lacing at the front and a zip in the side. Loop at the back and a decorative welt seam around the soles. Fleece linings and insoles and chunky rubber soles. Heel approx. 2.5 cm.

Dress in a patterned weave with a frilled collar, gathered yoke and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Long sleeves with elastication at the cuffs, and a seam and wide flounce at the hem. Unlined.
